Name: Leave
Desc: Will not appear again during this business session after being seated

Name: Keep
Desc: Customers won't leave if they are not seated when the period changes.

Name: Regular
Desc: Will not leave when the period ends if not seated. Will appear again in the next period if seated.

Name: Expansion
Desc: You may increase the customer limit.

Name: Auto-Add
Desc: No manual action required. Will automatically be added to the list when Bianca is added.

Name: Join
Desc: When Bianca is seated, immediately obtain one of Discord, Palma, or Issarius.

Name: Assessment
Desc: Will automatically leave after passing the assessment.
